meta_title: Orfina Porsche Design Chronograph Ref. 7177 – Dial Four-Logo Variants
meta_description: Explore the four-logo dial variants of the Orfina Porsche Design Chronograph Ref. 7177 featuring early 'Orfina' and later 'PD' logos, Porsche Design script, tritium luminous markers, and vintage Lemania 5100 movement. Detailed look at the historic evolution of this iconic 1970s chronograph dial.
meta_keywords: Orfina Porsche Design 7176 dial variants, four-logo dial, Orfina logo, PD logo, Porsche Design script, Lemania 5100 dial, vintage chronograph dials, Top Gun watch dial, Porsche Design chronograph dial history

list.title: Four-Logo Dial:
list.text: The first circa 500 serials of the 7177’s feature a four-logo dial with an additional “Porsche Design logo” not present on the Baseline variation and the “PORSCHE DESIGN” text replaced with “CHRONOGRAPH”.

list.title: Unique Rehaut:
list.text: The Four-Logo variant is also the only 7177 where the Crooked Seven Rehaut is found.

list.title: Serial Range:
list.text: Each watch is serialized, and all are between 1 and ~500.

list.title: Finishes:
list.text: These watches are only found in Non-PVD Silver/Sablé or Black PVD.

list.title: Day/Date Wheel:
list.text: It is important to note that the majority of the four-logo examples seen have had Italian day wheels. However, we seek further examples to clarify this for certain.
